name: Red Pills Blue Pills
description: This piece from the "Boxed" collection is a nod to one of the best movies our time, the Matrix. But it presents to you a different question. What is there is no ONE red pill or ONE blue pill? What if there are many many pills to choose from everyday? Micro decisions, mini choices, that change our lives every second, and decided if we stay in the illusion or break free in small pieces. Bonus points if you notice the glitch.
